revisions.rev:
{{Infobox tvseason | image = | season_name = Casualty'' series 16 | show_name = ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' | bgcolour = #005555 | fgcolour = #ffffff | dvd_release_date = Unknown | country = [[United Kingdom]] | network = [[BBC]] | first_aired = {{Start date|2001|9|15|df=y}} | last_aired = {{End date|2002|6|29|df=y}} | num_episodes = 40 | prev_series = [[Casualty (series 15)|15]] | next_series = [[Casualty (series 17)|17]] }} The sixteenth series of the [[United Kingdom|British]] [[medical drama]] [[television series]] ''[[Casualty (TV series)|Casualty]]'' commenced airing in the United Kingdom on BBC One on 15 September 2001 and finished on 29 June 2002. [http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0096555/episodes#season-16 IMDB Casualty Series 16] It saw another increase, this time to 40 episodes. On 30 March 2002, Episode 350 had to be shown on [[BBC Two]], due to some schedule changes on BBC One, since the [[Elizabeth Bowes-Lyon|Queen Mother]] had died that day.


==Cast== *[[Derek Thompson (actor)|Derek Thompson]] as Charlie Fairhead *[[Cathy Shipton]] as Lisa "Duffy" Duffin *[[Robert Gwilym]] as [[Max Gallagher]] (Episodes 1-36) *[[Ian Kelsey]] as [[Patrick Spiller]] (Episodes 1-28) *[[Christine Stephen-Daly]] as Lara Stone (From Episode 3) *[[Ian Bleasdale]] as [[Josh Griffiths]] *[[Jan Anderson (actress)|Jan Anderson]] as Chloe Hill (Episodes 1-20) *[[Zita Sattar]] as Anna Paul *[[Will Mellor]] as Jack Vincent *[[Adjoh Andoa]] as Colette Kierney *[[Martina Laird]] as Comfort Jones *[[Kwame Kwei-Armah]] as Finlay "Fin" Newton *[[Ben Keaton]] as Spencer *[[Dan Rymer]] as Dillon Cahill *[[Kelly Harrison]] as Nikki Marshall *[[Amy Robbins]] as Rachel James (Episodes 1-15) *[[Judy Loe]] as Jan Goddard (From Episode 3) *[[Lee Warburton]] as Tony Vincent (Episode 11 onwards) *[[Fiona Gillies]] as Philippa Kinross (Episodes 14-19) *[[Emily Dormer]] as Gilly (Episodes 24-30) *[[Christopher Colquhoun]] as Simon Kaminski (Episode 29 onwards) *[[Loo Brealey]] as Roxanne "Roxy" Bird (Episode 32 onwards) *[[Simon MacCorkindale]] as [[Harry Harper]] (Episode 37 onwards) ===Major guest stars=== *[[Bob Mason]] as Jeff McGuire (From Episode 1) *[[Morag Siller]] as Leona (Episode 9) *[[Lisa Palfrey]] as Melanie Collier (Episode 37 onwards) *[[Dorian Healy]] as David Collier (Episodes 37-40) *[[Janet Dibley]] as Amanda Lewis *[[Arthur Caulfield]] as Ben Lewis *[[Charis Thomas]] as Natalie McKay (Episodes 2,14 and 15) *[[Chad Shepherd]] as Rob Jones ==Episodes== {{Main|List of Casualty episodes}} {| class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !
